overview: Jason Szuzuka focuses on business development at Brighter. Prior to Brighter, he was President of PatientFYI.com, which was the first online resource that matched patients with doctors by specific services & strengths. Jason has been in the healthcare industry for over 10 years including leadership positions as Vice-President of GE Consumer Finance, Business Director at PacifiCare, and Associate General Counsel for UnitedHealhcare. Jason is a member of the State Bar of California with a Juris Doctor from Southwestern and BA’s in Business and Political Science from Southern Methodist University.
